name: A sock too late
description:
Movement = WASD
Interact = E
Oh no! Gregg Barrelson is running late for work! Gregg works at Sock & Sons, and has to find his new sock model to present to his boss within 90 seconds. Guide Gregg around his apartment and help him find the red socks - be careful of any other socks, as Gregg's model requires red socks. Better be fast, as the longer you take the more intense everything gets!
This is my first time coding a game so expect a lot of bugs and glitches
